sentences.en: After the extermination of the Jedi ranks, lightsabers became rare relics.
sentences.cn: 在绝地组织灭亡后,光剑成为一种罕见的文物.

sentences.en: All door and window is sealed for the extermination of mosquito.
sentences.cn: 为了消灭蚊子，所有的门窗都被封闭起来了。

sentences.cn: 塔西佗是必须的, 消灭特拉托斯是必须的.

sentences.en: Chapter III Control and Extermination of Animal Epidemics.
sentences.cn: 第三章动物疫病的控制和扑灭.

sentences.en: Children of fourteen were considered " independent " for purposes of transport to the extermination camps.
sentences.cn: 为了把犹太人运往灭绝集中营,14岁的儿童就被视做 “ 独立 ” 的人.

sentences.en: He added the president could also face five counts of crimes against humanity, including murder, extermination, forcible transfer of the population, torture and rape.
sentences.cn: 他还说，巴希尔可能还面临另外五项反人类罪的指控，包括谋杀、灭绝、强迫人口迁徙、酷刑和强奸。

sentences.en: Heydrich chaired the 1942 Wannsee Conference, which discussed plans for the deportation and extermination of all Jews in German occupied territory, thus being the mastermind of the holocaust.
sentences.cn: 海德里希主持了1942万湖会议，会议讨论了所有德国杯占领土地的犹太人的驱逐和灭绝犹太人计划，因此成为了大屠杀的主谋。

sentences.en: In doing so they were saved from extermination.
sentences.cn: 这样一来却使它们免于绝灭.

sentences.en: Increasing salinity caused by the evaporation resulted in the extermination of scores of invertebrate species.
sentences.cn: 由蒸发引起的越来越高的盐度造成无脊椎动物种类的灭绝.

sentences.en: Jefferson's suggestion to pursue the Indians to extermination fits well into the eugenistic vision.
sentences.cn: 杰弗逊认为追求印第安人灭绝很符合优生论.

sentences.en: Many living thing species extermination or the perdition are caused by this way.
sentences.cn: 许多生物物种的灭绝或频临灭亡就是如此造成的.

sentences.en: The best - known destination for dark tourism is the Nazi extermination camp at Auschwitz in Poland.
sentences.cn: 波兰的纳粹奥斯威辛集中营是最有名的黑色旅游地点.

sentences.en: THE choice for our people, Mr President, is between statehood and extermination.
sentences.cn: 总统阁下,我们的人民的选择是, 要么建国, 要么绝种.

sentences.en: The following is a list of roach extermination techniques using simple tools.
sentences.cn: 下面列出了一系列使用简单工具的小强消灭术。

sentences.en: The Karen people comprising mostly of poor Christian farmers have been singled out for extermination.
sentences.cn: 卡伦帮内部从事农业耕种的、贫困的基督徒被挑选出来并屠杀.
